verses.verse: In <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I take <S%H2620>refuge.<s%> How can you <S%H559>say<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H5110>"Flee<s%> as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> to your <S%H2022>mountain!<s%>"

<S%H7563>For,<s%> behold, the wicked <S%H1869>bend<s%> their <S%H7198>bows.<s%> They <S%H3559>set<s%> their <S%H2671>arrows<s%> on the <S%H3499>strings,<s%> that they may <S%H3384>shoot<s%> in <S%H652>darkness<s%> at the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
If the <S%H8356>foundations<s%> are <S%H2040>destroyed,<s%> what can the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6466>do?<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is on his <S%H3678>throne<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven.<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>observe.<s%> His <S%H6079>eyes<s%> <S%H974>examine<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H974>examines<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and him who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8130>hates.<s%>

On the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> he will <S%H4305>rain<s%> blazing <S%H6341>coals;<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H1614>sulfur,<s%> and <S%H2152>scorching<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall be the <S%H4521>portion<s%> of their <S%H3563>cup.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous.<s%> He <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%> The <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H2372>see<s%> his <S%H6440>face.<s%>
